instructions.step_1: Go to GitHub repository Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions
instructions.step_2: Click 'New repository secret' for each secret below
instructions.step_3: Copy the exact name and value from the repository_secrets object
instructions.step_4: For AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET, create a new client secret in Azure Portal first

create_client_secret.step_1: Go to Azure Portal → Azure Active Directory → App registrations
create_client_secret.step_2: Find your app registration (or create one if needed)
create_client_secret.step_3: Go to Certificates & secrets → New client secret
create_client_secret.step_4: Copy the secret value and replace 'YOUR_CLIENT_SECRET_HERE' above

verification.expected_result: Pipeline should authenticate successfully with Azure
